source_caption_data.pre_caption: In this abstract scene, a bright cyan light source is fixed at the top center in the background. From this source, thin, vertical streaks of blue light extend downwards through the middle ground, concentrated in the center and fanning out slightly to the left and right. Numerous small, glowing blue particles are scattered throughout the frame, occupying both the foreground and middle ground. These particles continuously drift upwards from the bottom of the frame, converging toward the central light source at the top. The camera remains static, maintaining a fixed view of the upward-flowing light.
